DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Pharmacokinetics Oral BIBP 5371 CL Healthy Male Female Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer Age 21 50 year Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 Any finding medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate , respiratory rate , body temperature ECG ) deviate normal Gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , respiratory , cardiovascular , metabolic , immunological hormonal disorder Diseases central nervous system psychiatric disorder neurological disorder History relevant orthostatic hypotension , faint spell blackouts Chronic relevant acute infection History allergy/hypersensitivity ( include drug allergy ) deem relevant trial judge investigator Intake drug long halflife ( > 24 hour ) within least 1 month less 10 halflives respective drug enrolment study Use drug might influence result trial ( within 1 week prior administration trial ) Participation another trial investigational drug ( within 2 month prior administration trial ) Smoker ( > 10 cigarette > 3 cigar > 3 pipes/day ) Inability refrain smoke trial day Alcohol abuse ( > 60 grams/day ) Drug abuse Blood donation ( â‰¥ 100 mL within 4 week prior administration trial ) Excessive physical activity ( within last week study ) Any laboratory value outside reference range clinical relevance In addition , female subject : Pregnancy Positive pregnancy test No adequate contraception e.g . oral contraceptive , intrauterine device , sterilisation Females , surgically sterile ask additionally use barrier contraception method ( e.g . condom ) prior administration study medication , study least 1 month release study Inability maintain adequate contraception whole study period Lactation period
